name: Trebuchets VS Aliens
description:
This is my entry for the Kenney Jam 2019, also my first entry in a game jam ever, also hopefully the first game that I will finish :)

Goal of the game

Middle ages. Your castle is being attacked by alien spaceships. The fate of humanity is in your hands. 

CAN. YOU. HANDLE. THIS.

Use you trebuchet to shoot boulders at the incoming spaceships that you can barely even see incoming in the distant horizon.

List of controls
  • Move your mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
How does it fit the theme?

I believe it fits the Unlikely combinations theme because people don't usually associate aliens / spaceships with the Middle Ages. 

Asset packages used in the project
  • Space UI pack
  • Castle Kit
  • Space Kit
  • Kenney fonts

Thank you for trying my game!
